name: dfs.namenode.checkpoint.period
description:
The number of seconds between two periodic checkpoints.
    Support multiple time unit suffix(case insensitive), as described
    in dfs.heartbeat.interval.If no time unit is specified then seconds
    is assumed.

name: dfs.datanode.directoryscan.interval
description:
Interval in seconds for Datanode to scan data directories and
  reconcile the difference between blocks in memory and on the disk.
  Support multiple time unit suffix(case insensitive), as described
  in dfs.heartbeat.interval.If no time unit is specified then seconds
  is assumed.

name: dfs.namenode.full.block.report.lease.length.ms
description:
The number of milliseconds that the NameNode will wait before invalidating
    a full block report lease.  This prevents a crashed DataNode from
    permanently using up a full block report lease.

name: dfs.disk.balancer.max.disk.throughputInMBperSec
description:
Maximum disk bandwidth used by diskbalancer
      during read from a source disk. The unit is MB/sec.

name: ha.failover-controller.cli-check.rpc-timeout.ms
description: Timeout that the CLI (manual) FC waits for monitorHealth, getServiceState
